summary: Email chain from August 22, 2019, between the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), the Office of the Inspector General (OIG), and the FBI, coordinating interviews related to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and discussing the seizure/imaging of a phone believed to contain information related to Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Coordination for MCC Interviews and Phone Imaging
events.description: Email correspondence to coordinate interviews with several individuals (names redacted) related to the MCC and to arrange for the imaging of a phone that may contain information related to Epstein's death.

locations: One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 22, 2019, discussing the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
A phone belonging to an unnamed individual is sought as it may yield information directly related to Epstein's death.
The email coordinates interviews with several redacted individuals related to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The correspondence involves multiple agencies: the U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY), the Office of the Inspector General (OIG), and the FBI.
All personal names in the document are redacted, indicated by brackets or placeholders.
